function.name: createRawNarrative
function.description: Creates a narrative for a video based on given themes and durations.

theme.description: Descriptive keywords for the narrative's style, e.g., 'Fun, High Energy, and Exciting'.

totalTargetDuration.description: The total duration of the video in milliseconds.

rawNarrative.description: Detailed list of video segments, each including type, name, and duration.

type.description: The type of segment, e.g., 'Title Sequence', 'Montage'.

name.description: The name or title of the segment.

duration.description: Estimated duration of the segment in seconds.

bpm.description: Beats per minute, if applicable, for setting the pace of the video.
